long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides quality of life features for Azure DevOps.

Enables the tab button to be used as a tab character in DevOps textareas, and pressing return from the "effort" input box will save and close the popup.

Either setting can be switched off to meet the user's exact needs.

More features to come.
